column23: It ain't like you to hold back
column27: I hate to turn up out of the blue uninvited
column28: 我讨厌这种突如其来的场面
column29: But I couldn't stay away I couldn't fight it
column30: 但我无法离开，无法抗拒
column31: I had hoped you'd see my face and that you'd be reminded
column32: 我多希望你能看着我的脸 然后注意到
column35: 对我来说，一切还没结束啊
column39: 我会找到一个像你一样的人
column40: I wish nothing but the best for you too
column41: 我也只是希望你一切顺利
column47: 有时因爱而活,But sometimes it hurts instead,有时却也因它而受伤

column50: You know how the time flies
column52: Only yesterday was the time of our lives
